intro.description: This Cheat Sheet allows you to get started with Simulation Tool. It brings an step-by-step howto in order to start using this tool correctly.

item.title: Create or Select a DPIM/DTSM model
item.description: Create a new DPIM/DTSM model or select an existing one from the Project Explorer view. A DPIM/DTSM model is an UML Class model annotated with the DICE DPIM profile.

subitem.label: Create a new UML Class Model
Open an existing UML Class Model. Browse the Project Explorer view, and open it.

item.title: Complete the model
item.description: Complete the model creating the necessary elements

subitem.label: Apply the DICE Profile to your class model in the Properties Views, by selecting it in Profile section

item.title: Execute the Simulation tool
item.description: When the model is done, use the Simulation tool button to configure and execute the Simulation Tool

item.title: Set variables
item.description: If the model has variables, then set them

item.title: Run the configuration
item.description: Finally, click the run button in order to execute the configuration for Simulation Tool
